channel.title: How to Edit the Client(HLP)
channel.description:
I wont make a 1000 different posts for my questions, all ask what I need at the moment, now.
#1 How do I Edit the Rune Scape Background?
#2 How do I edit the (Create Account) To (About)?
#3 How do I edit Item Colors/Names etc.?
When Answering a question please put
Example: A#1. Or Something Similar to that^

item.title: How to Edit the Client(HLP)
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:4, topic:303903”][quote author=tysoncroft link=topic=400165.msg2967867#msg2967867 date=1253737832]
how do i get to the client.java/gui.java?
[/quote]

:rolleyes:

Lol’d.

@ Topic, You can also do ctrl f on the main file location and search for the item.

In your client folder? Open a file?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How to Edit the Client(HLP)
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

  1. Some Backgrounds can’t be edited.
  2. Do ctrl f in client.java/gui.java
  3. Item Colors/Names/ etc. would be in the server files…?
